document_data.name: Tumblestone River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tumblestone River''' was a narrow river that originated in the hills north of the village of [[Arnglar]] in the [[Border Kingdoms]] and flowed roughly northeast through the realms of [[Middle Mukshar]] and [[Nether Mukshar]] until it reached the shores of the [[Lake of Steam]], a total course of approximately 60 miles.{{Cite web|url=http://archive.wizards.com/default.asp?x=dnd/frbk/20060322a|title=The Border Kingdoms|author=[[Ed Greenwood]]|publisher=[[Wizards of the Coast]]|accessdate=2014-09-13}}
